content: knit up this whimsical floral delight that incorporates colorwork latvian braid and embroidery experience level * intermediate materials * woolstok worsted 100% fine highland wool 50g/123yds 1 hank * woolstok worsted bundle 100% fine highland wool 21 mini hanks 5g/12yds 1 bundle bramble & fig * stitch marker * tapestry needle * embroidery needle * pom-pom maker finished measurments * circumference 20 * height 8 color shown * grey harbor no 1304 a * wild thyme no 1306 b * mossy green no 1326 c * october sky no 1305 d * northern lights no 1322 e * lilac bloom no 1325 f * pressed grapes no 1307 g * deep velvet no 1314 h notes this pattern is complimentary until 3/11/2026 for the learn-a-long video tutorials week 1 launching 2/18 week 2 launching 2/25 week 3 launching 3/4 week 4 launching 3/11
